extends Object

/** A utility class hiding details of the EMF / IFC bridge implementation.

getPart21ModelAtURI

public static qut.part21.Model getPart21ModelAtURI(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri)
Returns the part 21 model of the IFC building model at the given URI.

Parameters:

Returns:
the corresponding part 21 model

getPart21ModelForResource

Returns the part 21 model of the IFC building model contained in the given resource.

Parameters:

Returns:
the corresponding part 21 model

printModelStatistics

private static void printModelStatistics(qut.part21.Model model)
Prints some aggregated values for the given part 21 model.

Parameters:
model - a part 21 IFC building model

savePart21ModelAtURI

public static void savePart21ModelAtURI(qut.part21.Model model,
                                        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri)
                                 throws IOException
Saves the given part 21 model as the only content of the (potentially new) resource at the given URI.

Attention: If a resource already exists at the given URI it will be overwritten!

Parameters:
model - a part 21 IFC building model
uri - the URI to be used for storing the given model
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurred during saving
